snippet: McMurry, based in Phoenix, and TMG Custom Media, based in Washington and once known as the Magazine Group, are merging in a transaction being overseen by the investment firm, the Wicks Group of Companies.
abstract: McMurry, based in Phoenix, and TMG Custom Media, based in Washington and once known as the Magazine Group, are merging in a transaction being overseen by the investment firm, the Wicks Group of Companies.
